reviewText: I was invited to a screening of this movie last week and I was pleasantly surprised. This movie is seriously under rated. We all know the story of Justin Bieber, but this movie goes into far more detail about his early career and let's you know about things we all wondered. Like what happened to the girl that beat him in the Ontario talent show?! She's in this movie!! And she talks about her life after beating Justin Bieber. The movie also has interviews from people who actually matter in the music industry. Big name celebs like Snoop Dogg and Rihanna. Tons of soundbites from Justin Bieber himself and the quality of the film is way better than others I have watched. If you are truly a fan of The Bieb then you should want an accurate in-depth look at his life leading to his stardom. This film delivers just that and I am glad to be adding it to my collection. You will not be disappointed.
I saw this movie at a special screening and it was awesome!  Lots of great Justin Bieber footage!  I can't wait to buy the "Biebermania!  DVD!

Purchased for a little girl at our church to go with her Justin Bieber PJS. She can enjoy watching it in her new JB PJS. Thanks Amazon and seller

My daughter loves Bieber so I try to get her his stuff and this was one she didn't have yet.  She loves it and would recommend it for any Bieber fan, yes even your teenager if they love Bieber has well.  My daughter loved the necklace that game with it, the extras were a perk.  Great case, my daughter was beyong thrilled to get this.
It was a 8th birthday gift for my granddaughter.  She loves anything Justin Bieber.  She was thrilled and couldn't wait to go home and watch it.
I was having a sleepless night. Fell right asleep in the first 10 minutes. I really try to be open minded and see if I can like him, but so far not a convincing movies.
Anything with this guy is less than a 1 terrible role model for children. Go ahead smoke some more and influence todays kids.  Grow up and realize the responsibility as a celebrity
my granddaughter really enjoyed this dvd. she is a big fan of justin bieber. i was so happy to find this dvd for her.

We have bieber fever in this house with 2 girls...so for valentines it was one of their presents....I so bombed on this present.  The video is horrible, never see much of Justin, just some person talking about him.
I would be wasting words as I bought this for my grand daughter. Hope she enjoys the video. Happiness is important.

Bought this for my pre-teen who loves Justin Bieber. She didn't like it at all. It didn't have him in it very much, just interviewed other people about him and gave their opinions and his history. There weren't any JB songs. She wants to see and hear Justin Bieber! Spend your money on something else JB-related.

I bought this for my 4 year old beiber obsessed daughter. we were very unhappy. we thought there would be some of his songs or even a video not a monotone  documentation i am actually considering calling amazon to see if we can handle this issue as a refund or credit not worth a penny

After viewing all the DVDs available on Justin Bieber, I have to say this is the worst one.  It was boring.  Ten year old got up and left the room, she said she liked Never Say Never better.  So did I.  This one was ALL talk, no singing and we didn't care for some of the people reviewing his rise to fame.  Even the title was misleading to me.  Also didn't care for the constant reference and filming of the girl that beat him out in his home town talent contest.  She's certainly no Justin Bieber.  Got the feeling the people in the DVD just didn't care much for him.  I'm no teenager, but I like him and think he has a good chance of being around a while.  If he can keep his head and not go "Hollywood" on us.  This DVD was a waste of money.
I have seen this twice in theatres and it is amazing, and the extras on  the DVD are even better! Highly recommend it.

I think it's great that Justin Bieber has creative talent like this at such a young age. This video shows off his talents as a new teen pop star. Just think he started out on youtube and someone dicovered him and this brought him to superstardom. This video has everything about him in it, it ought to be great.

I was not interested in seeing this movie at all, but when it came out, I was curious about what drew so many people to this young star.  I have to admit, it was made well and had a good moral to it.  The boy has worked hard for his fame and I cannot fault him for that.  I would recommend this movie to others.

I checked out this movie because I have two teenaged girls and they both love him. I was suprised to see how tough he had it growing up; the respect factor has increased exponentially not only because of his talent, but what he had to go through in order to get to where he is.
This is a great dvd, the kids absolutely love it. a great example of just how talented justin is i would highly recomend this video to anyone with justin bieber fans in there home.
The story of Justin Bieber's rise to worldwide fame is almost unbelievable!  This video contains great footage and is super entertaining.  I would definitely recommend it to any Bieber fan!

I have this DVD and I realized once you watch it you will learn more about Justin's Life
before I didn't know any of that, He worked hard to be a Pop Star. Get this DVD it is the best
Info about Justin Beiber A++
I got this DVD because my Granddaughter's just love him.  They really liked watching it and liked seeing how he went from YouTube to super stardom.  It is a good clean and fun dvd.
Ever since I got this it has not left my DVD player! For anyone who is a fan of Justin Bieber this is an absolute must have!

My little brother insisted me to buy this DVD, and i can say that i have no regrets for having it in my collection. Bieber is a great kid, with amazing music talent. If there is anyone who loves his music and himself, i recommend this DVD because it delivers the story of the rising of this star.

DVD caputes the world wide sensation that is Justin Beiber.  My Daughter begged me for weeks to get her this DVD.  I finally bought it for her birthday and she has been enthralled ever since.  Great DVD for Justin Beiber fans!
This movie dvd is excellent quality and well done. Although I am not a fan of his I think this movie was enjoyable and fun to watch. Definitely one to watch if you are a fan!

I had to buy this for my niece who is in love with Justin Bieber. She was glued to the tv set as she watched this, but not only was it interesting for her, I also enjoyed it because it tells the story of how an artist becomes famous. Anyway, I am sure it will only be young ones who watch this, and they will love it regardless of the filming styles as long as Bieber is in it.
I LOVE THIS MOVIE!!! ITS SO INSPIRATIONAL AND MY LITTLE COUSIN LOVES IT TO!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT I SWEAR I HAVE BEEN WATCHING IT EVERYDAY FOR THE PAST WEEK JUST TO HEAR "BABY" PLAY!
I've loved Bieber even before he was famous. This disk has everything I want to know about him all in one box set. The quality is great and the price is amazing. A good present!
All though I am not a fan of Just Bieber something has to be said for the quick rise to fame he experienced.  This movie is fascinating and that is for true.

Biermania of course tells the story of the teen idol, and how he got his start.  Is something that any Justin Bieber fan would want to own.  It has great footage of Bieber in performances and interviews.

I bought this for my cousin who is a huge fan of Justin Bieber.  She absolutely loved it!!  She said it was great to hear all the details about how he became a big star.  I'm not a fan, but found the story intriguing.

Justin Bieber ROCKS!!! I love all his music, and this dvd tells you everything about this superstar. Great DVD and a must have for all the fans who adore him
and his awesome music!

Excellent music video, charting Bieber's success from his beginnings on youtube to his worldwide fame today. I thoroughly enjoyed watching this biographical DVD, and was quite surprised by how good it actually was. Would definitely recommend.

From when he was first discovered on Youtube, to the behind the scenes with Justin, it is a must have for the Bieber fans. I thought I knew everything about him, but I didn't. Very enjoyable and I learned a lot.

I am one of the biggest movie watchers on the planet and I can honestly say that this was an amazing movie and i recommend it to everyone who comes across it. I loved every moment on it and i do not regret the purchase of this movie. I have replayed this movie almost 15 times now and i have had it less then a month now! I know all of you who purchase this will enjoy it as much as i did!!

This movie does a great job of showing Justin Bieber's growth as a musical artist. It shows his efforts from before he was famous to when he was signed by Usher and his career was launched. This is a great DVD that I recommend to any Bieber fan!

My niece is a huge fan of Justin Bieber, must like a lot of girls her age. So I got her this DVD on a whim after seeing it in stores. She was so happy when she saw it and watched it right away. She loved the insight into his life and in all honestly gave me more respect for him, myself.

Purchased for my younger sister's Birthday.. She is a big Justin Bieber fan and was absolutely thrilled to add this to her collection. She plays it over and over on a daily basis - great gift idea for any Bieber fan. I personally am not all that interested in Justin Bieber, but I catch myself now even singing along at times!

In my' view, Justin Bieber is the best singers ever. I am a fan of him and love his singing very much. I wish I would be a singer like him. Thank you very much for making Justin Bieber Biebermania! I JUST CANT WAIT
I bought this movie for my daughters they loved it. They did not want to watch any other movies I had to make them a movie room. If you want to make your daughters happy buy this movie.

I bought this video because I thought I would have a movie night with my grand-daughters and wanted to get something they would enjoy.  But truth be told, Grandma enjoyed the movie as much as the kids.  I didn't know the back story to this young man and found his rise to fame interesting.  I thought the presentation of him and his family was enlightening. I have to admit that the young man has more talent than I was aware of and this movie displays it beautifully.
I love how this movie shows it from the beginning. His meeting with Usher is something else. He seems so calm and collected. This is a must watch for people anyone!

Personally, I wasn't a Justin Bieber fan because I thought he was just all flash and glamor and not really talented. After watching this DVD however (with the help of my girlfriend), I actually now respect him as a performer.
How can you resist this guy? My kids are huge fans, fan club, website you name it. This DVD plays in my house on a repeat basis.

This movie was far better than I expected!  My granddaughter wanted to see this, so see it we did.  I like that there are other celebrities present in the movie, and the chronicling of Justin's rise to success is amazing.  Dreams can come true for some!  It could give other youtube submitters hope for a future career.

My daughter has entered the world of Biebermania and this DVD is just packed with great moments documenting his rapid rise to fame. If your kids are in to Justin Bieber in any way at all I highly recommend you purchase this DVD.
Gift

Thanks my daughter loved this movie and is in love with Justin Bieber For 8 Years Now she just was so happy when i gave it to her. Shes 20 years old and is in a special  needs Program This was one of her easter Presents Since i don't give her candy for easter thats what Halloween, Christmas is for. I asked her what she wanted and this one of the things on her list but wound up ordering it after easter cause i just got a keen replacement. This came today alto earlier then i excepted so happy this gave her entertainment while i was doing my Psychotherapy i don't like her seeing me in pain. So thank you for making her happy :)
